I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry Page will be even better! Larry Page , in my clear opinion, is ready to lead. In a statement, Mr. Larry Page said Mr. Eric Schmidt 's track record speaks for itself.`` Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade,'' he said.

Martin Luther King Day doesn't have much to do with civil rights, strictly speaking. It addresses the shooting of Rep. Gabrielle Giffords of Arizona and the rhetorical and budgetary attacks on public employees of recent months. ALBANY, NY( 01/14/2011)- The recent horrific events in Tuscon have saddened us all. However, from every tragedy lessons can be learned and the attention given by many to the contribution of violent rhetoric as cause for the shootings may be just the opening to bring civility back to our public discourse. I am further bolstered by the genuine joy expressed by U.S. Senator Kirsten Gillibrand in her account of the awakening of her friend and colleague Congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords during a visit to the shooting victim's hospital room.

perfect ending. Allen Iverson sank the first buzzer-beating shot of his nine-year career, a 14-footer in overtime, and scored 15 points to lead the Philadelphia 76ers to a 106-104 victory over the Indiana Pacers on Friday night. It's a great feeling to hit a shot with no time on the clock, said Allen Iverson , who sank a halfcourt winner for the US Olympic team against Germany in an exhibition game. Allen Iverson is getting used to dramatic shots. He sent a game into overtime in the final seconds Earl Watsonier this

I think deep down, people get tired of the everybody's a winner, everyone is special pablum of the PC Age. Raw, biting truth has become a kind of spectacle- a preserve of freaks. American politics could use a Simon Cowell , but would he ever get elected to anything?
